short_summary: Equipment maintenance and repair services for health services clinics, hospitals, pharmacies and regional headquarters.
description: Equipment maintenance and repair services for health services clinics, hospitals, pharmacies, and regional headquarters.  Mandatory requirement for a Nationally Certified Senior Medical Equipment Biomedical Technician as per the ACS Infrastructure ", Medical Equipment Technologies Branch for assigned technicians.  Work includes certain medical equipment inspection, calibration, repair/maintenance, testing and replacement as detailed in Annexes B, C, D, E, F, G, I, J, K.  Work to be performed in provincial/time zone of Region.  Ministerial requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents for a five (5) year contract term.
tags: nationally certified senior medical equipment biomedical technician
